GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v6.1.8
GSD.description:
misc: fastrpc: Don't remove map on creater_process and device_release

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.8 by commit 35ddd482345c43d9eec1f3406c0f20a95ed4054b, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit b49f6d83e290f17e20f4e5cf31288d3bb4955ea6. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: misc: fastrpc: Don't remove map on creater_process and device_release
